title: Carlsbad Caverns National Park: Park Ranger's Blog
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Park Ranger's Blog              Cavern Chatter       RSS  About This Blog Interesting information shared by rangers about the park. Topics vary so log in regularly to see what we have to share!   The Beauty of Slaughter Canyon Cave  June 13, 2016 Posted by: Lacey Thomas  1 Comments     Slaughter Canyon Cave and all it's beauty      Peace and Tranquility  April 14, 2016 Posted by: Lacey Thomas  0 Comments     Peace and serenity in the Chihuahuan Desert      Gas, Fire and Illusion  April 14, 2016 Posted by: Mark Kaufman  0 Comments     Dark desert lit by controlled gas burn      Jim White, Cave Explorer  January 14, 2016 Posted by: Lacey Thomas  2 Comments     Cave Exploration      Alien Life in Martian Caves?  December 15, 2015 Posted by: Mark Kaufman  4 Comments     Could life on Mars be similar to microbial life in caves?      The Mystery of the Sloth  December 15, 2015 Posted by: Mark Kaufman  8 Comments     Sloth remains found in the cave - but how did they get there?      The Zombie Effect  October 08, 2015 Posted by: Mark Kaufman  6 Comments     The parasitic effects of horsehair worms on crickets.       Deep Inside the Cave Are Answers  September 17, 2015 Posted by: Mark Kaufman  6 Comments     Information about how the Ice Age sculpted the landscape in the Chihuahuan Desert.       Killing a Bat Killer  September 17, 2015 Posted by: Mark Kaufman  1 Comments     No known cure for a fungus that has killed millions of bats world-wide.
